en:
[color=#66CCFF]Game Background[/color]
In the Papercut Kingdom dominated by 2D characters, two competitive professions exist:

[Seeker]: Constantly measuring angles in 2D world to locate 3D objects, shouting "Coordinates locked!" when found  
[Observer]: Responsible for flattening 3D objects into 2D equipment through dimensional reduction, but often fails due to perspective errors
Competition among observers has intensified, with projection duels becoming routine. The "Guardian Artifact Cup" is now in full swing, where defeating five top-tier opponents consecutively unlocks substantial rewards.
[color=#66CCFF]National Treasure's Attributes[/color]

Front view →[color=#e4c914] Yellow ■ Shield[/color] (DEF MAX)  
Side view → [color=#ff0000] Red | Sword[/color] (ATK MAX)  
Vertical view → [color=#75e3ff] Blue / Staff[/color] (MAG MAX)  

[color=#66CCFF]Controls[/color]

[color=red]A  D  ← →[/color]  Switch horizontal viewing angle  
[color=red]W  S  ↑  ↓[/color]   Switch vertical viewing angle  

[color=#66CCFF]Rock-Paper-Scissors System[/color]
■ Shield deflects | Sword → "Strike as you will, I stand firm"  
| Sword pierces / Staff → "Melee counters flashy tricks"  
/ Staff blasts ■ Shield → "Magic breaks defense, shields crumble"  

When identical equipment collides: "No recursive sets!" (System freeze)

[color=#66CCFF]Tips[/color]

Use arrow keys to switch viewing angles  
Observe countering forms before enemy attacks  
Higher combo count grants extra score bonus  
Being countered resets combo
zh-CN:
[color=#66CCFF]游戏背景[/color]
在纸片人横行的瞳之国，?搜寻者和观察者是两大卷王职业：

?搜寻者：整天拿着量角器在二维世界找三维物体，找到就大喊"坐标已锁定！"
?观察者：负责把三维物体"降维打击"成二次元装备，但经常因为视角偏差翻车——
观察者之间的竞争日益激烈，投影对决已成常态。近日，「镇国神器杯」赛事正火热进行，参赛者需连续击败五位顶尖对手，即可赢得丰厚奖励。
[color=#66CCFF]镇国神器的属性[/color]

正后看 →[color=#e4c914] 黄 ■ 盾牌[/color]（防御MAX）
侧面看 → [color=#ff0000] 红|长剑[/color]（攻击MAX）
俯仰看 → [color=#75e3ff] 蓝 / 法杖[/color]（魔法MAX）

[color=#66CCFF]操作说明[/color]

[color=red]A  D  ← →[/color]  切换水平观察角度
[color=red]W  S  ↑  ↓[/color]   切换垂直观察角度  

[color=#66CCFF]克制关系[/color]
■ 盾牌 ?反弹 | 长剑 → "你砍任你砍，我自岿然不动"
| 长剑 ?刺穿 / 法杖 → "近战专治花里胡哨"
/ 法杖 ?轰飞 ■ 盾牌 → "魔法破防，盾牌自闭"

当相同装备对撞时："禁止套娃！"（系统直接卡死）

[color=#66CCFF]提示[/color]

使用方向键切换观察角度  
在敌人攻击前观察克制形态  
连击数越高额外分数加成越高  
被克制则连击数清零

en: A standard eyeball with no distinctive features
zh-CN: 很普通的眼珠子，没什么特色
比较无敌的眼珠子，可以改变速度
有点猥琐的眼珠子，是个藏比
各个方面都会一点的眼珠子
